title: SNMP
subject: Computer Networks
theory:
Protocol for monitoring devices. 
- **Agent**: Runs on router/switch.
- **Manager**: Server collecting data.
- **MIB**: Database of metrics (CPU load, Bandwidth).
- **Trap**: Agent alerts Manager of error.

real_world_use_cases.description: Graphing traffic usage on a dashboard (Nagios/Zabbix).
